statements: SELECT * FROM therapy_notes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, session_date, session_notes FROM therapy_notes WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT session_date, progress_report FROM therapy_notes WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM therapy_notes WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT note_id, therapist_name, progress_report FROM therapy_notes WHERE progress_report LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT * FROM therapy_notes WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT therapist_name, progress_report FROM therapy_notes WHERE therapist_name IN ('Dr. Smith', 'Dr. Johnson')
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM therapy_notes WHERE patient_id = 123456
SELECT * FROM therapy_notes ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_name FROM therapy_notes
SELECT * FROM session_notes;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_notes FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM progress_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, report_date FROM progress_reports WHERE patient_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT session_id, session_date, therapist_id FROM session_notes WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' AND session_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM session_notes ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_notes FROM progress_reports WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id, session_date FROM session_notes WHERE patient_id = '456e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT therapist_id, progress_notes FROM progress_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM session_notes;
SELECT note_id, therapist_id, created_at FROM session_notes WHERE patient_id = 15;
SELECT note_text FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE therapist_id = 7;
SELECT patient_id, report_text FROM progress_reports WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM session_notes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT note_text, created_at FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notes FROM session_notes GROUP BY patient_id, therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE therapist_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_note FROM session_notes GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Psychology';
SELECT therapist_name, location FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE therapist_id = 101 ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM session_notes WHERE patient_id = 201 AND therapist_id = 102;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT plan_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM progress_reports GROUP BY therapist_id;
SELECT therapist_name, location FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_name FROM therapists;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, note FROM session_notes;
SELECT progress, session_id FROM progress_reports;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_id FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, note FROM session_notes WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE progress LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
